item.Q:
Write the character:
to break; to split; broken; damaged; worn out
item.A:
破 (strokes unavailable)
pò
破坏 (破壞) pòhuài wreck; break; destroy

item.Q:

refined (rice); the most refined; spirit; soul; vitality; energy; semen; sperm; mythical goblin spirit; highly perfected; elite; the pick of sth; proficient (refined ability); extremely (fine)
item.A:
jīng
精神 jīngshén vigor; vitality; drive; spiritual; mental; psychological

to answer; agree
答应 (答應) dāying reply; promise
bùpòbùlì without destruction there can be no construction
dǎpò to break; to smash
pòkǒu crevasse
pòàn to solve a case
pòchú (v) get rid of, discard

traditional: 識破
shípò to penetrate; to see through
shòujīng to receive sperm; fertilized; insemination
jīnglì energy
jīngzǐ sperm; spermatozoon
jīngdù precision
jīngxīn with utmost care; fine; meticulous; detailed
jīngmíng astute; skilled

traditional: 精確
jīngquè accurate; precise
jīngshén vigor; vitality; drive; spiritual; mental; psychological
jīngměi delicate; fine; refinement

traditional: 精華
jīnghuá best feature; most important part of an object
jīngtōng proficient

traditional: 精選
jīngxuàn chosen
běibànqiú the northern hemisphere

traditional: 半場
bànchǎng half of a game or contest; half-court
bàntiān half of the day; a long time; quite a while

traditional: 半失業
bànshīyè semi-employed; partly employed; underemployed

traditional: 半工半讀
bàngōngbàndú part work; part study; work-study program
bànnián half a year
bànchéngpǐn semi-manufactured goods; semi-finished articles; semi-finished products

traditional: 半數
bànshù half the number; half
bànsǐ half dead (of torment, hunger, tiredness etc); (tired) to death; (terrified) out of one's wits; (beaten) to within an inch of one's life; (knock) the daylights out of sb
bànqiú hemisphere
bànshēng half a lifetime

traditional: 半自動
bànzìdòng semi-automatic
bànlù halfway; midway; on the way

traditional: 半邊
bànbiān half of sth; one side of sth

traditional: 半邊天
bànbiāntiān half the sky; women of the new society; women folk
bànyīn semitone

traditional: 半點
bàndiǎn the least bit
Nánbànqiú (n) Southern Hemisphere
dàbàn more than half; greater part; most

traditional: 不約而同
bùyuēértóng (set phrase) to take the same action or view without prior consultation; happen to coincide

traditional: 和約
héyuē peace treaty

traditional: 大約
dàyuē approximately; about

traditional: 特約
tèyuē specially engaged; employed or commissioned for a special task

traditional: 相約
xiāngyuē to agree (on a meeting place, date etc); to reach agreement; to make an appointment

traditional: 約定
yuēdìng engage; promise; make an appointment

traditional: 約數
yuēshù divisor (of a number)

traditional: 約會
yuēhuì appointment; engagement

traditional: 但願
dànyuàn if only (it were possible to...)

traditional: 心願
xīnyuàn cherished desire; dream; craving; wish; aspiration

traditional: 情願
qíngyuàn willingness; would rather (agree to X than Y)

traditional: 意願
yìyuàn aspiration; wish (for); desire

traditional: 請願
qǐngyuàn petition (for action to be taken)

traditional: 請願書
qǐngyuànshū petition

traditional: 願意
yuànyì to wish; to want; ready; willing (to do sth)

traditional: 願望
yuànwàng desire; wish
xìalìng give an order
lìngrén to cause sb (to do); to make one (feel sth); (used in constructing words for feelings such as anger, surprise, sympathy etc)

traditional: 傳令
chuánlìng to transmit an order
xiānlìng shilling
kǒulìng oral command; a word of command (used in drilling troops or gymnasts); password (used by sentry)
mìnglìng (an) order or command
zhǐlìng order; command; instruction
fǎlìng decree; ordinance
dàodǐ finally; in the end; when all is said and done
jīdī fundus
niándǐ the end of the year; year-end
dǐxia the location below sth; afterwards

dīzǐ grounding
dǐzi base; foundation; bottom
dǐpiàn negative; photographic plate
dīsè underpainting

traditional: 底邊
dībiān hemline
xīndǐ bottom of one's heart

dǎdī bottoming
dǎdǐ underpainting

hǎidī ocean bottom
hǎidǐ seabed; seafloor; bottom of the ocean

yǎndī eyeground
yǎndǐ fundus of the eye (containing the choroid, retina, optic nerve etc); inside the eye; right in front of one's eyes; in full view as a panorama

traditional: 問答
wèndá question and answer
huídá reply; answer

traditional: 報答
bàodá repay; requite

traditional: 答應
dāying reply; promise
dáàn answer; solution

traditional: 答話
dáhuà to reply; to answer

traditional: 答謝
dáxiè to express one's thanks
jiědá answer; explanation; (math.) solution (of an equation)
